item.description:
at the Brewery Exchange Sports Bar in Lowell...
http://www.thebrewery...
Watch the Red Sox at the Brewery Exchange on the largest High Definition television in the area. They have a 159" HD television. Yes, you are reading it correctly it is a 13 1/2 foot television for your viewing pleasure. The Sox will be playing Toronto that night at Fenway, starting at 7.
Have the $9.99 prime rib dinner special and get one hour of free pool.
Sounds like fun.
:-)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Burgers, Baseball and Brews
